servinfo.title: Front Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Front Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation:Front

item.ptxt: Disassembly of wheel side joint assembly is not allowed. If any noise or damage exists in it, replace it as assembly.
Do not disassemble tripod joint spider. If any malcondition is found in it, replace it as differential side joint assembly.

s1.ptxt: Draw hooks (2) of boot big band together and remove differential side boot big band (1).
Wipe off grease from shaft and take off snap ring (1) using snap ring plier (2).
Remove tripod joint spider (1) using 3 arms puller (2).

attention2.ptxt: To prevent any problem caused by washing solution, do not wash tripod joint except its housing. Degreasing of tripod joint with cloth is allowed.

s1.ptxt: Remove differential side boot small band, and then pull out differential side boot from shaft.

servinfosub.title: Assembly
servinfosub.ptxt: Judging from abnormality noted before disassembly and what is found through visual check of component parts after disassembly, prepare replacing parts and proceed to reassembly.
Make sure that tripod joint housing is washed thoroughly and air dried.

item.ptxt: Do not wash boots in degreaser such as gasoline or kerosene. etc. Washing in degreaser causes deterioration of boot.
To ensure full performance of joint as designed, apply grease of specified volume and color to joint.

s1.ptxt: Wash disassembled parts (except boots). After washing, dry parts completely by blowing air.
Set new differential side small band and new differential side boot (1) on shaft temporarily, and then apply grease to tripod joint (2). Use specified grease in tube included in spare parts.
Install tripod joint spider (3) on shaft using special tool with hammer, directing its chamfered spline toward wheel side, and then fasten it with new snap ring (4) using snap ring plier (5).
Apply grease (including in spare parts) to inside of tripod joint housing (1), joint it with tripod joint.
Fit boot to grooves of shaft and housing.
Insert screw driver into boot and allow air to enter boot so that air pressure in boot becomes the same as atmospheric pressure.

item.ptxt: Bend each boot band against forward rotation.
Do not squeeze or distort boot when fastening it with bands. Distorted boot caused by squeezing air may reduce its durability.

s1.ptxt: Place differential side boot new big band (3) and new small band (4) onto boot putting band outer end (1) against forward rotation (2) as shown in figure.
Fasten differential side boot big band.

item.ptxt: For differential side boot big band
Fasten band (1) by drawing hooks (2) with special tool and engage hooks (3) in slot and window (4).
For differential side boot small band
Fasten band (5) securely using special tool.

attention3.ptxt: Fasten boot small band securely until complete contact “a” is obtained.
